law.catch_line: An employee of Worcester County is not eligible to participate in the employees' systems under this ...
law.text:
An employee of Worcester County is not eligible to participate in the employees' systems under this subtitle if the employee:
is employed by Worcester County on July 1, 1994;
was an employee of the Worcester County Sanitary Commission on October 31, 1993; and
is a member of the Worcester County Sanitary District Pension Plan or its successor.
